text: Nɨgɨm. Bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl yɨbɨl okok mɨdupsek, kɨli bɨ nab okok nɨb ak pen, God kɨlop keke aglɨl agek wog nop ak gɨpal. God ne bɨ olap nop anɨgɨl aglek, ne binɨb okok kɨlop gɨñɨnɨg, tap tep dam God nop ñɨl, tap sɨbog ñɨl gup. Anɨgek, God ne binɨb tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal okok tɨg walɨg gɨyokup.
